mdRecord.dcterms:title: First Lady of Armenia visits UVa
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McFadden, Tracy
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First Lady of Armenia Ludmilla Ter-Petrossian, with University President John T. Casteen III, visits the University to thank volunteers and staff of the Kluge Children's Rehabilitation Center for the care they provided to four children injured in the 1988 Armenian earthquake.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
